overview:
Jayalal Gopi is a multi-faceted leader and a very passionate entrepreneur with the ability to motivate cross-functional and cross-cultural global teams to deliver world class innovative software products with remarkable quality.

He is also an extremely successful software architect, versatile agile practitioner/evangelist, highly experienced developer and equally friendly individual with proven ability to deliver exceptional results - thriving in single or team player environments.

He has 20+ years of experience in complex software architecture, development and delivery. Extensive experience in managing product development end-to-end using Agile SCRUM and Kanban methodologies.

He was one of the founders of a technology startup company and was responsible for the development and delivery of its products for 9 years

Specialties

  • Building world class engineering teams
  • Coaching and mentoring of highly productive teams
  • Product architecture, development, delivery and life cycle management
  • SCRUM and Kanban specialist
  • Client relations, pre-sales and business delivery
  • Data mining, machine learning, recommendation engines
  • Scalability and performance engineering
  • Software factories and composite applications
  • Enterprise system architecture
